title: Opinion: Trump is hoping to delay his trial. The Supreme Court shouldn’t take the bait
description: The Supreme Court should decline any move for a stay and instead allow the trial to proceed, says Joshua A. Douglas. The country needs to know whether Trump is convicted of these crimes before the November election.

title: Haley's Nevada Loss To 'None Of The Above' Provides Ominous Warning For Super Tuesday
description: Haley’s campaign explained the result as unsurprising since she spent no money to win there — but that’s also largely true of the 15 states voting on March 5.

description: Video from the Qillah Saif Ullah district in Pakistan shows chaos and panic after a fatal blast, on the eve of the country's general election day. Elsewhere, a separate blast killed at least 12 people outside a independent candidate's party office in the Pishin district.

title: Row erupts over cost of Labour's home insulation plan
description: Labour has rejected as "bogus" an analysis by government officials that its plan to improve home energy efficiency would cost £12-15bn a year. The party has said the measures, part of a wider £28bn green investment plan, would be capped at £6bn a year.

title: Texas firm allegedly behind fake Biden robocall that told people not to vote

title: New Wisconsin poll shows Trump tied with Biden, Haley ahead by 15 points
description: A new Marquette Law School poll in Wisconsin showed Haley leading President Joe Biden by 15 percentage points among likely voters, 57 percent to 42 percent. Trump, meanwhile, was neck-and-neck with Biden, 50 percent to 49 percent, a result well within the poll’s margin of error of plus or minus 4.4 percentage points.
